Articles.Content:
Hey there,

There are many strings missing that should be in the place of holder variables in main menu, but this one is in the map-view, see screenshot:

Not just debris! If you deploy any craft, even a fully autonomous or fully controlled one, it will get a name like this. It would be really nice if non-controllable stuff gets marked as debris and controllable stuff takes on a name based on the thing that deployed it

The second thing I did in KSP2 was an Apollo style Mun landing. When I decoupled the CM/SM craft the LM craft got a name like this. When I flipped around and docked with the LM the  combined vehicle got another name like this. When I undocked the LM to descend to the Mun I got two names like this, and so on. In map view I quickly lost track of which vehicle is which in low Mun orbit. It would be really nice if...

1 hour ago, schlosrat said:

controllable stuff takes on a name based on the thing that deployed it
